resources.string: Need To Restart The Application To Take Effect

The Wait Timed Out, Make Sure Your Root Manager Is Running In The Background And Try Again! \N\Nplease Make Sure That You Do Not Prevent The "Authorization Manager (Supersu, Magisk Manager, Etc.)" From Starting Automatically, And Allow Permissions Such As Background Pop-Up Windows, Display Floating Windows, Etc. If The Authorization Dialog Box Has Not Popped Up, It Is Recommended To Restart The Phone And Try Again! \N
Sorry, I Didn'T Get Root Permission

Without Root Permissions, Many Features Will Be Lost. \Nif You Missed The Authorization Prompt, Or Did Not See The Pop-Up Window, Please Find Your Root Manager And Manually Set To Allow Scene To Use Root Permissions~
It Seems That Busybox Is Not Installed On Your Phone, Which Will Make Scene Unusable. Do You Want To Install It Now (Need To Modify System)?
You Can Also Try Scene, I Think It'S Pretty Good, Download Address:\N Http://Vtools.Omarea.Com/

Scene Enhancement Service\Nyou Need To Activate This Service To Use The Following Features:\N\N1. Dynamic Response (Automatically Adjust Performance According To Foreground Applications).\N\N2. Automatic Behavior (When Switching Networks Or Switching Applications When Switching The Screen Recycling Process).\N\N3. Automatic Installation (Automatically Click Next When Installing Third-Party Applications)
Backup The Currently Used Boot As Img And Copy It To /Sdcard/Boot.Img
Backup The Currently Used Export Recovery As Img And Copy It To /Sdcard/Recovery.Img
Export The Dtbo Partition As An Img Image And Copy It To /Sdcard/Dtbo.Img
Export The Persist Partition As An Img Image And Copy It To /Sdcard/Persist.Img
/Sdcard/%S.Img Already Exists, Do You Want To Overwrite The Existing File? \N
Insufficient Storage Space, Please Reserve At Least 200M Free Space!
In The Charging State, The Screen-Off Action Is Delayed Until The Charging Is Completed.
Switch Selinux To Permissive Mode (Some Software Is Called [Close Selinux]), Selinux Status Has No Effect On Scene, And Opening Permissive Mode May Crash And Restart!
Use The System Wallpaper As The Window Background, Showing A Translucent Interface
Displays The Log Of The Scene'S Determination Of The Foreground Application Process
Display The Function Description Prompt (Question Mark) Icon Next To The Function Item
Automatically End The Process When There Is An Abnormality In The Running Process To Avoid Stuck White Screen
When The Scene Crashes With An Error, Click The Button Below To Capture The Log Through Logcat And Send It To The Developer To Solve The Problem
When The System Is In Night Mode, Show Scene'S Resident Notifications As A Black Background (No Need To Enable This Option Under Normal Circumstances)
Click Here To Activate Ancillary Services
If You Want To Use The "Charging Speed Regulation" And "Charging Protection" Functions, Be Sure To Keep The Scene Running In The Background!

The Phone Will Determine Whether To Activate Usb-Pd Charging According To The Root Compatibility, No Manual Settings Are Required. Manual Switching Will Cause Slow Charging, So Manual Modification Is Not Allowed!
Has Entered Pd Fast Charge Mode
Does Not Enter Pd Fast Charge Mode
Ok, If You Want This Function To Be Enabled Automatically After The Phone Restarts, Please Allow Scene To Start Automatically After Booting!
The Charging Acceleration Service Is Disabled, You May Need To Restart The Phone To Restore The Default Settings!
Switch To Slow Charging When Close To Full\N\Nand Actively Reduce Charging Speed At Night
Stop Charging When The Specified Power Is Reached\N\Nnote: Long-Term Use May Cause The Power Display To Be Inaccurate
Reach %D%% To Stop Charging, Below %D%% To Resume

Adjust The Charging Speed Limit. It Is Meaningless To Increase The Crazy Value, Because It Will Not Achieve The Actual Effect, Please Adjust The Value Within The Effective Range\N\Nnote: The Upper Limit Value Is For Reference Only, Please Refer To The Actual Charging Speed!
The Charging Function Has Been Restored!
The System Adjusts The Upper Limit Of The Charging Speed In Stages According To The Power, Which Helps To Protect The Battery Life\N\Nit Is Generally Recommended To Keep The Default Settings

Scene Will Perform Speed Changes At Different Times Based On Your Selection, The Differences Are As Follows\N\Nreduce Speed: Reset The Charging Speed Only When The Charger Is Connected And The Battery Percentage Changes\Naccelerate Charging: The Battery Status Changes, The Charger Is Connected Re-Set The Charging Speed Every Second\Ncharge To Death: Based On The Logic Of [Charging Acceleration], The Charging Speed Is Automatically Reset Every Second
Charge Should Show A Positive Number And Discharge Should Show A Negative Number

The Currently Provided Application Data Backup Function Requires The System To Integrate Busybox And Toybox, Use Tar+Gz To Compress Data (If The System Supports It, Pigz Will Be Used To Improve The Compression Speed), And Only Backup The Data Under "/Data/Data/Application Package Name" , And Is Not Guaranteed To Be Compatible With All Systems And Applications. \N\Napp Backup Files Are In /Sdcard/Backups/Apps (Android 11+ System Does Not Support The Backup Function)
Please Do Not Enter Special Symbols For Model Information! \Ncompatible With The Model Code Of The [Application Variable] Module, Copy And Reopen This Window To Use!

After Modification, You Can Click "Restore" -> "Confirm" To Restore The Model Before The Modification. Uninstalling Scene Will Cause The Backup Model Information To Be Lost. Be Sure To Restore It Before Uninstalling! \N\Nalternatively, You Can Restore The Model Information By Reflashing The Full Rom! \N\Ndo Not Use This Function To Modify The Model When Using Dualbootpatcher Multi-System Software! ! !
This Feature Does Not Currently Support Your Device!
Auto Hide Status Bar, Navigation Bar

Disable The Real-Time Blur Effect Of The Flyme6 Pull-Down Notification Center To Reduce The Lag Of The Low-End Meizu Machine When Pulling Down The Notification Center During Game Or Video Playback. It May Also Save Power And Needs To Be Restarted.
Miui9 Go To The Notification Center To Search
The Search Box Of The Miui9 System Drop-Down Notification Center Is Hidden By Default, And It Will Take Effect After Restarting
Customize The Dpi Or Resolution Of The Phone, Which May Cause The Device To Fail To Start Normally, Or Ui Errors
By Changing The Build.Prop To Disguise The Model, Some Phones May Not Be Able To Boot Or Have Bugs
Customize The Mac Address Of The Mobile Phone Wifi Network Card, Only Support Some Devices
Customize The Mac Address Of The Mobile Phone Wifi Network Card, Only Support Some Devices, More Suitable For Android Q
Compile The Application With Dex2Oat To Reduce The Cpu And Ram Usage During Runtime. The Compilation Process May Take Half An Hour, And It Needs To Be Recompiled After The System Is Updated!

After Android N, In Order To Reduce Application Space Occupation And Improve Installation Efficiency, Dex Is No Longer Fully Compiled When Installing Applications, Resulting In A Decrease In Running Speed. Selecting "Compile" Through This Function Will Use The Speed Mode To Compile The Application When Installing The Application. The Installation Speed Is Significantly Slower, But The Running Time Is Smoother (About 20% Increase, No Improvement To The Game Frame Rate!). \N\Ntake The Douyu Tv Client Under The Oreo System As An Example, The Base.Odex Is Only 6.8Mb During A New Installation, And It Increases To 103Mb After Compilation. \N\Nhowever, Many Applications In China Use Hot Update Technology, And They Often Need To Download The Latest Code From The Server And Parse And Render At Runtime. This Is The Main Reason For These Applications To Start Slowly Or Freeze After Startup. Therefore, Dex2Oat Compilation Does Not Bring Significant Performance Improvements For Such Applications!
Applicable To Android N+, Adjust The Dex2Oat Compilation Strategy When The Packagemanager Application Is Installed, It Needs To Be Reset After Updating The System
Parse Wpa_Supplicant.Conf Or Wificonfigstore.Xml In The /Data/Misc/Wifi Directory

Turn Off Some Options In The Performance Boost Config To Avoid Power Consumption Caused By The Cpu Frequently Being Pulled Up To A Higher Frequency, But Keeping The Application Startup And Boosting The Frequency Will Slightly Reduce The Experience. A Reboot Is Required!
Swap Is Being Closed, Which Can Be Slow
Note:\Nthe Higher The Value, The More Active The Use Of Swap. The Impact Of This Setting On The Fluency Is Difficult To Perceive. You Can Adjust It As Appropriate~
Description: Zram Is An Implementation Of Swap. When Available Memory Becomes Insufficient, Some Data In Memory Is Compressed. But The Cpu Will Be Busy Because Of This~
Zram Is In Use And The Compression Algorithm Cannot Be Changed Right Now. \N\Nto Make The Settings Take Effect, Click The "Adjust" Button Below

If You Can Use Swap Normally Without Enabling This Option, There Is No Need To Enable It. \N\Nthis Option Only Needs To Be Enabled Unless Swap Cannot Be Activated, Or The Phone Freezes After Swap Is Activated! \N\Nfor Example: Xiaomi'S Sdm845 Model Is In Android 9.0, You Need To Check This Option To Use Swap Normally

Description: Swapfile Is Similar To Windows Virtual Memory, And The Swap Efficiency Is Limited By Disk Performance. Do Not Use This Function On Phones With Small Capacity Or Insufficient Space To Prevent The Flash Memory From Aging Too Fast!
Auto-Start At Boot (To Allow Scene To Auto-Start)
Note: You Need To Allow Scene To Start Automatically, It Will Take Effect Next Time You Boot!
You Have Installed The Magisk Framework. It Is Recommended To Use The Latest Version Of The Add-On Module To Enhance The Reliability Of Swap Control. The Main Functions Of The Add-On Are As Follows:
1. Improve The Speed Of Restoring Zram And Swapfile Settings After Restarting The Phone
2. Adjust The Lmk Parameters According To The Ram Capacity Of The Device To Strengthen The Background Retention Capability
3. Adjust The Vm Parameters To Improve The Enthusiasm For Using Zram And Swapfile
After The Module Is Downloaded, Please Flash It In Magisk Manager And Restart Your Phone!
The Compression Ratio Of Zram Is Usually Between 20~45%
Data Compression Algorithm: %S\Noriginal Data Size: %S\Ncompressed Size: %S\Nphysical Memory Usage: %S\Nmaximum Memory Usage: %S\Nmemory Usage Limit: %S\Ncompression Rate: %S
Data Compression Algorithm: %S\Noriginal Data Size: %S\Ncompressed Size: %S\Ncompression Ratio: %S

This Value Specifies How Much Extra Physical Memory The Linux Kernel Will Reserve. When Memory Is Insufficient, It Will Immediately Start Compressing Memory To Swap/Zram. The Device Will Become Noticeably Slower Until The Available Memory Is Back To A Reasonable Range.\N\Nsimply Put, The Higher The Extra_Free_Kbytes Setting Larger, The More Active Memory Recovery (Swap Or Kill Process) Is, But It Is Not Recommended To Set Too Large, So As Not To Waste Physical Memory And Increase The Burden On Disk/Processor!

The Value Range Is 0~1000, Of Which 1000 Means 10%, Which Means That The Difference Between The Three Values ​​Of The Memory Water Level Low/Min/High (The Physical Ram Capacity) Is 10%. \N\Nfor Example (My Phone):\Npagesize=4Kb\Nmanaged=1951743(Pages)\Nmin_Free_Kbytes=10900(Kb)\Nwatermark_Scale_Factor=500\N\Nthe Min Value Is\N10900(Kb)/4( Pagesize)=2725(Pages)\Nlow Value Is About\N1951743*5%+2725≈100312(Pages)\Nhigh Value Is About\N1951743*10%+2725≈197899(Pages)\Nnote: The Final Low And High The Value May Be Too Large Due To The Influence Of Extra_Free_Kbytes\N\Nin This Example,\Nmin=2725=10Mb\Nlow=100312≈392Mb\Nhigh=197899≈773Mb\N\Nmeans That The Memory Will Start To Be Reclaimed When The Memory Is Lower Than 392M Ram Until Free Ram Is Above 773Mb~
The Battery Is Too Low, Please Charge It In Time!
Not A Single App Is Selected!
No Usable Schema Configure Script Found

The App Does Not Come With A Performance Configuration Script For Your Phone. You Can Choose "Get Script Online" To See If A Configuration For Your Phone Is Available For Download, Or Choose "Learn More" For A Custom Configuration Tutorial!
For The First Time Use, First Select The Configuration Preferences

Some Mobile Phones Have A Dynamic Adjustment Mechanism For Cpu Parameters, Which Will Cause The Custom Parameters To Fail Quickly. In Addition, Temperature Control Will Also Limit You To Increase The Cpu Frequency.
Please Long Press To Select A Directory
Please Download And Install "Scene-Advanced Settings" From Scene, And Set It To Allow Background Auto-Start!
Failed To Sync Xposed Settings From "Scene-Advanced Settings" Component!
When Installing Third-Party Applications, Automatically Click "Next" And "Install" For You

Automatically Click The "Skip" Button, Which Can Help You Automatically Skip Some Open-Screen Advertisements, But It Will Reduce System Performance And Cause Delays\N* Only Use It In Simplified Chinese To Have Better Results
Use Some Button Data Recorded In The Cloud To Click The Special Skip Button

Advertising Traffic Is An Important Source Of Income For Some Software Developers/Businesses. If Your Time Is Not Very Tight, It Is Recommended That You Browse And Click On The Advertising Content You Like ^_^
Please Authorize To Allow Scene To "Modify System Settings" First!
Please Authorize To Allow Scene "Notification Usage Rights" First!

Scene Is An App For Gamers Who Need To Have Excellent Eyesight, Reading Comprehension And A Good Attitude To Use It. \N\Nunexpected Errors May Occur During Use, Resulting In Data Loss Or Even Failure To Boot Normally. \N\Nplease Do Not Use It On Your [Used For Work] Or [Important Data] Phone To Avoid Loss! \N\Nin The Process Of Use, Be Sure To Read The Prompt Information Carefully And Operate Carefully, And Do Not Easily Toggle The Function Options That You Do Not Understand! \N\Nfurthermore, The Author Of This Application Does Not Guarantee That It Will Provide Assistance And Failure Recovery Advice!
Please Authorize The Permission To Display The Floating Window For Scene First!

Let Scene Automatically Adjust The Lmk Parameters According To Your Ram Capacity, Thereby Enhancing Background Capabilities (May Cause Lag When Low Memory). If You Need To Restore, Please Turn Off This Option To Restart The Phone, If You Want To Set It Automatically After Power On, Please Allow The Toolbox To Start Automatically
The Busybox Integrated By Scene Does Not Support Your Current System, Please Download And Install Busybox Yourself
For The Following Apps That Have Been Added To Bias Mode, The Startup Shortcuts Have Been Lost Or Have Not Been Created Successfully. Do You Want To Recreate Them Now?
Adding Shortcuts In Batches May Fail, You Can Long-Press The App Icon To Send A Single Shortcut To The Desktop!
√ Icon Display Status Has Been Switched
You May Need To Manually Delete Shortcuts That Have Been Added!
Requires "Read And Write Local Storage" Permission To Use System Wallpaper As Software Background
Would You Like To Add "%S" To The Desktop For Quick And Easy Access?
This Function Does Not Support Adding Shortcuts
Requires Read And Write Access To External Storage
The Specified Configuration File Does Not Exist Or Does Not Have Read Permission

Most Of Scene'S Modifications To The System Can Now Be Carried Out In The Form Of Magisk Modules. However, You Must First Agree To Scene'S Automatic Installation Of Add-Ons On Your Phone, And Restart Your Phone (Recommended)!
No Profile Detected, Dynamic Response Disabled Automatically!

Click The Menu In The Upper Right Corner, Select And Edit The Temperature Control File, And Click Save After Editing~\N\Nnote: With The Continuous Update Of The Android System, It Becomes More And More Difficult To Modify The System Partition, And The Modification May Not Be Successfully Saved, Or It Will Be Automatically Restored After Restarting. It Is Recommended To Use The Magisk Module To Complete The Temperature Control Modification! \N\Nthe Temperature Control File Is Generally In The /System/Etc Or /Vendor/Etc Directory, The Name Starts With "Thermal" And The Suffix Is ​​".Conf"
Process Manager Is Not Compatible With Your Phone Yet!
